name: helpkb
description: A superfast and easy to use knowledge base to help your customers get the info they need, when they need it most.

scripts.start:ui: cd ui && NODE_ENV=production npx next start
scripts.start: npm run install && npm run build && npm run start:api & npm run start:ui
scripts.dev: npm run dev:api & npm run dev:ui
scripts.prod: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.install: npm run install:ui && npm run install:api
scripts.db:setup:test: npx dotenv -e .env.test -- npx prisma db push
scripts.db:setup:dev: npx dotenv -e .env.development -- npx prisma db push
scripts.db:setup:prod: npx dotenv -e .env.production -- npx prisma db push
